A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's not a good film. The characters make stupid decisions\, it doesn't feel human. The humor falls flat. It does a disservice to the already shallow Star Wars universe by not offering anything new\, and simply undercutting what came before. I don't care where any of these characters go. And I won't be joining the cult of zombie fans who love these new films rabidly and without discernment. It's sad\, but it's almost worse than Rogue One.
